globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdnjs.cloudflare.com cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' cdnjs.cloudflare.com fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; media-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https:
